entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
